author: rgardler
msg: build the APache Projects site - nag mails sent to rgardler@a.o for now

author: rgardler
msg: The start of an Apache Projects site. This is being developed for site-dev@a.o but is placed here until I find the time to add some documentation and bring the XSL up to speed with those being developed in site-dev and propose it's inclusion in the site-dev repository. To add more projects to the list add an entry in the locationmap.xml as describd in the projectInfo plugin docs.
